reviews.review: Once you understand the mechanics and strategy, this game becomes very fun to play. Best played with friends over discord.

The game was awesome before the update. The new update removed so many good functions and perks and changed the way the whole game works, if this update didnt happen the game would be good but now it is trash

Pues mira gran persona, el juego es excelente, es decir, ejecuta a la perfecci√≥n todo aquello a lo que se propone, que realmente el fin de este gran juego, es transportarte a una esfera de terror y tensi√≥n constante que lo logra llevar de manera espectacular, el juego engancha de una forma que no es normal, acabar√°s pecando por mentiroso cuando digas que ser√° la ultima partida que jugar√°s. El juego claramente es para jugarlo con tus amigos, por que se hace mucho m√°s divertido y pod√©is llevar acabo t√°cticas y ayudaros mutuamente a la hora de reparar los generadores, ser asesino no es tan f√°cil como lo aparenta un principio y estate seguro que m√°s de un DLC te acabar√°s comprando.

Eso si hay bastante toxicidad por ah√≠ suelta, si vas ha entrar en este juego, prep√°rate para llevarte m√°s de un insulto hacia tu coeficiente intelectual o a tu madre, espero que lo disfrutes, yo ya he jugado bastante.

Fun playing with friends but have to say that this game contains lots of toxic gamers.
jogo mt bom, mas mts bugs e comunidade cheia de boludo racista

Played it once again, 4 months after, and still give me the wish to end my days with a fucken nail gun. Behaviour decided to went full retard on this game. Still playing because I hate myself.


I love the game but I'm putting a dislike hoping the developers will see it and fix their stupid ranking level, It's been there from the very begin and I still land against the best rank you can have when I'm the lowest rank. For gods sake Behaviour I'm not putting my life on this game so would it be possible to play against people the same rank I am ? Lot of people are sick of all this shit on how Behaviour don't give a fuck about their game and I'm pissed off too. Once had a friend who played this game every day, and I sometimes played with him as well. Now, neither of us enjoy this game because of all those "PROS" and all the campers or all the teamates that don't even bother trying to save you. This game doesn't deserve your money anymore and probably won't in the future so save it for later.

one of the worst solo gaming experiences I have ever had.
I have somewhere between 1-2k hrs on console and im glad i bought it on pc just hate how theres still no cross progression between pc and consoles
This game is absolute shite! Loved it

The way this game is pretty good and fun trying to escape a nightmare of a trail with nothing but your wits and survivor buddies, and along side killer it's also fun to hack and slash survivors in the taste for blood, the game is pretty fun overall and with the way the progression system works is very rewarding and this game isn't so pay to win since you can always buy perks from the shrine with enough shards, the only main issue is with killers who tunnel (focus on a single survivor, mostly first hooked) or camp (stay nearby a hook, grabbing and/or killing any rescuers), I wish those two main issues could be fixed, but the game is still overall pretty fun and worth the 20$ if you're lucky enough to get good matches

the game is pretty fun playing while with friends and that. it is good and takes a effort to learn about the basic but it¬¥ll be worth it. i recommed playing this game, but dont play it to much because it may effect your normal status of your opinion and that can be a little to sad and depressed.

good asymmetric survivor game, consistent developing.

You can either play with your friends to bully one person or play killer and bully four others. 10/10

Only gripe with the game is how slow progression is, but it keeps you playing at least ¬Ø\_(„ÉÑ)_/¬Ø

the game has a lot to offer the amount of killers / survivors theres is gives a lot of diffrent playstyles builds and such, sadly most of them are blocked behind dlc's that are suprisingly cheap especialy on sales when most of them cost 2.5euro, even if you dont plan on spending money on this game you can still get all the perks and most of the killers/survivors for free by playing and being lucky in the shrine of secrets which has 4 perks out of every other for you to buy, game is pretty fun has a very high skill celling in both killer and survivor although some survivor perks/killers/killer perks are unblanced and unfun to play against so i would keep that in mind also the community in most cases is incredibly toxic either is it t-bagging or being a dick as the killer. In conclusion the game has a lot to offer and can give you a good time playing it but in some situations you just want to blow your brain out

I only play Dead by Daylight, not because I like it, but because Demo is there. When I sit at the PC I just want to see Demo. I have a sad life, so I always think of Demo. I look at the sky full of stars and I see Demo, I feel the wind on my skin and I think of Demo. I just want to spend as much time as possible with Demo. When I bought this game I thought I would stop playing it immediately, I hated it and still hate it. The only reason I'm still here is Demo

after almost 500 hours and hitting rank 1 a few times as killer i would for sure say this is a good game to kill time, if you have lads to make a 4 man party it makes it even better but the game does get harder if you go the solo que way. however it's worth it in the end as i am going for rank 1 in both roles to keep the game fun and learn to tricks to get better in both roles. oh and stay away from legion. bad killer
e tenso e muito divertido, principalmente quando se jogar com os amigos.
